description: Allows you to either upgrade your Amazon OpenSearch Service domain or perform an upgrade eligibility check to a compatible version of OpenSearch or Elasticsearch.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: Name of the OpenSearch Service domain that you want to upgrade.

parameters.name: TargetVersion
parameters.description: OpenSearch or Elasticsearch version to which you want to upgrade, in the format Opensearch_X.Y or Elasticsearch_X.Y.

parameters.name: AdvancedOptions
parameters.description: Only supports the override_main_response_version parameter and not other advanced options. You can only include this option when upgrading to an OpenSearch version. Specifies whether the domain reports its version as 7.10 so that it continues to work with Elasticsearch OSS clients and plugins. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: UpgradeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the domain upgrade.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The name of the domain that was upgraded.

nested_items.name: TargetVersion
nested_items.description: OpenSearch or Elasticsearch version that the domain was upgraded to.

nested_items.name: PerformCheckOnly
nested_items.description: When true, indicates that an upgrade eligibility check was performed.

nested_items.name: AdvancedOptions
nested_items.description: The advanced options configuration for the domain.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressDetails
nested_items.description: Container for information about a configuration change happening on a domain.

nested_items.name: ChangeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the configuration change.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message corresponding to the status of the configuration change.

nested_items.name: ConfigChangeStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the configuration change.

nested_items.name: InitiatedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM principal who initiated the configuration change.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the configuration change was initiated, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the configuration change was updated.
